summary: Implements the core prediction loop for Lightning PyTorch, coordinating data fetching, model mode switching, hook execution, batch‑wise inference, and aggregation of prediction outputs while handling device placement, distributed strategies, and optional multi‑processing.
business_intent: Enable users to run efficient, scalable inference with Lightning models by abstracting away data loading, device management, callbacks, and result collection, thus simplifying the deployment and evaluation of trained models.
